name: SerpApi (Google Search)
natural_language_description: 这是 SerpApi (Google Search) 节点。主要用于: Search in Google using SerpAPI

notice.displayName: This node must be connected to an AI agent. Insert one
notice.name: notice
notice.natural_language_description: 参数名: This node must be connected to an AI agent. Insert one

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: gl (值: None) - Defines the country to use for search. Head to Google countries page for a full list of supported countries.
device (值: None) - Device to use to get the results

no_cache (值: None) - Whether to force SerpApi to fetch the Google results even if a cached version is already present. Cache expires after 1h. Cached searches are free, and are not counted towards your searches per month.
google_domain (值: None) - Defines the domain to use for search. Head to Google domains page for a full list of supported domains.

hl (值: None) - Defines the language to use. It's a two-letter language code. (e.g., `en` for English, `es` for Spanish, or `fr` for French). Head to Google languages page for a full list of supported languages.
